im.tox.jtoxcore

Class ToxException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • im.tox.jtoxcore.ToxException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ToxException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception class used in the Tox project. Carries an Errorcode that signals the error that occurred during the execution of native code
    Author:
    sonOfRa
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
